scripts.build:rspack: pnpm clean && rspack build && pnpm size
scripts.build:rsbuild: pnpm clean && rsbuild build && pnpm size
scripts.build:webpack: pnpm clean && webpack build -c ./rspack.config.mjs && pnpm size
scripts.build:vite: pnpm clean && vite build && pnpm size
scripts.build:farm: pnpm clean && farm build && pnpm size
scripts.build:parcel: pnpm clean && parcel build src/index.html && pnpm size
scripts.build:bun: pnpm clean && bun build --minify --outfile=dist/index.js ./src/index.js && pnpm size
